data.conditions: 6 AMGood morning, Jackson Hole. A quickly dissipating cloud cover greets the morning sun to start the day, but before long a near bluebird sky will be on display. By late morning, you can expect the vitamin D will have you feeling fine, as just a few scattered clouds saunter across the skyline. High temperatures will climb their way into the upper teens at the summit and near the 30-degree mark in Teton Village. A gentle western breeze will join in the show as they blow through in the 5 to 15 mph range. If you're feeling a bit lost and need perspective shifted, you don't need to be some kind of Zen-gifted whiz kid. Just hop on the aerial tram to get both physically and mentally lifted. -Lege

forecast_days.skies: Snow And Rain. Snow And Rain

forecast.day_comments: A chance of snow showers, mainly between noon and 5pm.  Partly sunny, with a high near 13. West wind 3 to 5 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 40%. Total daytime snow accumulation of less than a half inch possible.
forecast.night_comments: Partly cloudy, with a low around 1. Wind chill values as low as -6. West wind 3 to 6 mph.
